description: This table contains information at a claim line level for expected allowances.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the claim print record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The claim line number for the information associated with this claim. Multiple claim lines can be associated with this claim.

columns.name: PX_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The billed amount for this claim line.

columns.name: CONTRACT_PRICE
columns.description: The contract price for this claim line.

columns.name: EXPECTED_PRICE
columns.description: The expected reimbursement amount for this claim line.

columns.name: PYMT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category number for the payment method that is associated with this claim line.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Fee Schedule


Capitation Table


Percent of Billed


Per Diem


Percent of Fee Schedule


Minimum of Fee Schedules


Weighted Fee Schedule


Global Case Rate


None


Minimum of Options


Percentage After Threshold


Case Rate


Percent of Billed - Apply Modifiers


PPS Pricing


Extension Only


Maximum of Fee Schedules


Maximum of Options


Minimum of Fee Schedules with Floor Price


APC/APG Weight x Rate


DME Rental


DME Rental - Legacy Pricing


Percent of Invoice/External Amount

columns.name: PRIMARY_PMT_RATE
columns.description: The primary payment rate for this claim line.

columns.name: PRIMARY_CVD_QTY
columns.description: The primary quantity for this claim line.

columns.name: ADDL_PYMT_MTHDS
columns.description: Any additional payment methods for this claim line.

columns.name: ADDL_PYMT_RATES
columns.description: Any additional payment rates for this claim line.

columns.name: ADDL_CVD_QTY
columns.description: Any additional quantities for this claim line.

columns.name: LINE_PENALTY_PRCNT
columns.description: The penalty percent for this claim line.

columns.name: LATE_SUBMIT_DAYS
columns.description: This column stores how late this claim was submitted, in days.

columns.name: LATE_SUBMIT_PERCENT
columns.description: The late submit penalty percent for this claim line.

columns.name: U_AND_C_AMOUNT
columns.description: This column stores the Usual and Customary amount for this claim line.

columns.name: CLM_PX_OUTLIER_INFO
columns.description: The outlier payment information for this claim line.

columns.name: PX_INS_PORTION
columns.description: The portion of the claim line that is the insurance's responsibility.

columns.name: PX_PATIENT_PORTION
columns.description: The portion of the claim line that is the patient's responsibility.

columns.name: PX_PYMT_MTHD_DESC
columns.description: Free text method description for this claim line.

columns.name: PX_PYMT_TERM_DESC
columns.description: Free text term description for this claim line.

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the component or component group used in adjudicating this claim line.

columns.name: COMPONENT_ID_COMPONENT_INDEX_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component index record

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the contract used in adjudicating this claim line.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID_CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.

columns.name: CONTRACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A numerical representation of the contact date for the contract used in adjudicating this claim line. Used to help link to the VEN_NET_CONT_SVC table.

columns.name: CONTRACT_LN
columns.description: The contract line number used in adjudicating this claim line.

columns.name: PX_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the procedure that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the medication that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the diagnosis-related group (DRG) that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: COMPONENT_GROUP_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the whole claim component group that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: PX_COMMENT
columns.description: The free text comment about the procedure that is associated with this claim line.

columns.name: PX_TAX_AMT
columns.description: The tax amount for a procedure based claim line. Used when tax amounts are calculated using expected reimbursement values.
